about_the_game:
■ Game Description

The Cats Go! Demo version offers a single-player experience, unlike the full version, which supports 4-player multiplayer.

In this demo, players can explore the snow-covered winter map and focus on defensive strategy. Defend the cat village in the winter map and experience the core elements of defense strategy and battle against monsters.

■ Single Player Mode

Defend the village as a brave cat! 🐈

Since you must defend the village alone, use limited resources wisely to strategically place towers and defeat incoming monsters. Upgrade the mutant plants to strengthen the defense in the harsh winter environment. While there are no allies to rely on, this mode allows you to explore defense strategies all on your own.

■ Fun Features

Growing Mutant Plants 🐈

  • Defeat monsters to gather resources and power up the mutant plant towers for stronger defenses!

Bomb Throwing 🐈

  • Throw powerful bombs that can stun all monsters within a certain range, enhancing your defensive strategy!

Exclusive Winter Map 🐾

  • Protect the cat village in the snowy winter map and set up unique strategies for this cold environment.

In the Cats Go! Demo, the full version’s asymmetrical multiplayer content is unavailable, but you can experience the core elements of village defense in single-player mode. Enjoy richer content in the full game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yesemite or higher
  • Processor: M1 or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Yesemite or higher

name: Cats Go! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The Cats Go! Demo version is a single-player strategic defense game. Become a cat and defend the village from waves of monsters on the winter map! Set up towers and grow mutant plants as you experience the strategy of defending the village all on your own.
